attributes.action: Create law forcing Foreign Nationals to be made redundant in any position before the British Worker.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British Workers must be given priority in the workplace. Law must be created requiring companies to secure British workers jobs first! Foriegn Nationals (eg. a worker with a foreign passport) should always be made redundant first. This law will help stop companies employing foreign nationals while British workers look for jobs.
